website_summaries.verdict: A very popular starter set for those who seek a closer shave. The bowl, stand and razor are all constructed from rust-resistant chrome, and look good on display in a main bathroom.
pros: Large bowl promotes good lather formation
Razor is heavy, feels secure in hand
Black gift box is very sleek and modern

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would try the single blade, throwback shaving method. And this set seemed to be pretty good without breaking the bank. It required some minor assembly, which was fairly simple. Overall quality is very good. My only detractor (pretty minor) is that the unit can tip if you have the razor removed resulting in it becoming unbalanced. If the base was a bit larger, that issue could be resolved. So I would take off a half star for that, if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and Not a Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year a little over a year ago. The finish in the soap bowl has peeled and corroded and the brush continually sheds hairs. I would suggest spending your money on a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Casey F.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my husband and he is going to love it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Best shave
customer_reviews.text: Best shave I’ve ever had. The brush is nager, so it kind of has an odor, but the odor goes away after a couple of uses. And replacement blades are Cheap!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set in April, my husband loved the brush. Said it lathered the soap well. He used it daily for not even three months before the brush came unglued from the handle and is completely useless.

customer_reviews.title: This is nice enough but I gave it only 3 stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is nice enough but I gave it only 3 stars because the stand is unstable and will tip over at the slightest kind of nudge.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, and came unglued! after 5 uses!
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed like a good deal, but after using about 5 times now, the brush has come unglued. Disappointed that the item is not built to last. It's only 2 months old and already the brush has fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Thops6

customer_reviews.title: The stand and brush are very nice, however the threads on the safety razor might ...
customer_reviews.text: The stand and brush are very nice, however the threads on the safety razor might as well be made out of play-doh. First time unscrewing it out of the box and I find that it's cross threaded. Cheap, cheap, cheap metal. Finally getting it unscrewed I found that the threads looked like they went through a lawnmower. Totally unusable. I'll keep the stand, but I'll have to purchase another razor holder.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this garbage
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this garbage: the razor gives you nothing but irritation, the brush fall apart after just couple times of using. The only bright side: the seller offered refund without questions asked. Looks like, the seller is very aware about the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent set
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my husband for his birthday. He like it but had a hard time figuring how to put the razor in. It does not come with instructions. We read one of this reviews on this site on how to install the razor. The packaging was pretty poor for this set at this price. I had to secure everything in this box with additional tissue paper & the box came slightly damaged. The set it self gives a nice finish to the bathroom and the base is secure, doesn't tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Linder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaving set but.....
customer_reviews.text: This would have gotten a 4 star review if I didn't have to cut some of the bottom padding with a razor knife to make it sit flush on the counter top. When put together it would wobble from side to side because of the bolt at the bottom of the stand it would push against the padding on the bottom and when you put everything on the stand it would never sit straight and sometimes fall over. But I got this at a discount price from Amazon warehouse deals from a return. So not a deal breaker. But it works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and delivered as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and delivered as expected. The razor is good quality but I do not care for the blade locking mechanism. Very difficult to change blades but does work very nicely with a sharp blade. The rest of the setup is classy and works really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this as I wanted to learn how to use a safety razor rather than the more modern day multiple bladed razor. This kit literally has everything you need to start and I have found it to have a good weight, appealing colour and was pleasantly surprised to find extra blades within the set. Very happy with this product, would highly recommend! 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Shari Jackson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SET
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my father he loved it. He says it shaves really close.It leaves him really smooth. Just wish it came with more razors.Looks great and should last for many years to come.Excellent quality and beautiful aesthetic design. This is a perfect shaving set.

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and function

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shaving Kit

Very nice presentation and he said he is getting a very good shave with the razor.He can't get over how close of a shave he gets with this shaving kit ! I recommend this product, especially for those just starting with a safety razor.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for husband or father.

Worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Quality and good apearance.

Razor is a good weight and it all comes in an attractive black box. I bought it as part of a 50th Birthday gift and I am sure my son-in-law will be delighted with it.
